topic.title: Question: Future Tor ban in the EU
topic.body: The EU is trying to ban Tor, if they pass the law is there any possible work around so you can still use Tor?

1553193009_1KHWybGXJ9cwqzANezSfXbrEq9sgS.body: If they work together with the internet service providers I think they can disable some connections e.g. when youÂ´re trying to acces a non european server yet I dont know how they are going to do this I only know they want to pass a law which would make tor usage illegal
